Scope_-_Catch.description: Flow execution scope in case of an (unexpected) error in one of the actions in the Try scope.

Set_variable_-_Reset_varGraphUri.description: The graph API URI to request the list of AAD applications. The $select only returns the necessary attributes and to overwrite the default 100 items per page, the $top is set to 999 so it uses less requests (1 per 1000 apps vs 10 per 1000)

ErrorEmailBody.1033:
Dear sir/madam,

An error occurred in the workflow for fetching and displaying the expiring credentials for the Azure App Registrations in tenant '{TENANT_ID}'. More information is displayed below. Please review and act accordingly.

Workflow
{WORKFLOW_NAME}

Environment
{WORKFLOW_ENVIRONMENT}

Link to flow run
{WORKFLOW_RUN_URL}

With kind regards,
